medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain after diet advancement post cyst drainage.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced longstanding abdominal pain. After the procedure to drain the pancreatic cyst, she advanced her diet quickly starting heavy cheese, which led to bloating and generalized abdominal pain. Symptoms include no discharge, fever, nausea, or vomiting. Patient presented to PCP and was referred to the ER.
